name: Face Vomiting
baseMeaning: A face vomiting green substance, indicating sickness or disgust.
tldr: Gross! Used for disgust, something nauseating, or literally being sick.

contextMeanings.meaning: Dramatic reaction to something mildly unpleasant.

platformNotes.note: Used for strong reactions to controversial opinions.
Common in dramatic reactions to stories.
Popular for expressing disgust in gaming contexts.

generationalNotes.note: Frequently used for dramatic disgust reactions.
Used for both actual sickness and disgust.
